title: Queue Timer
body: i'm a returning player first of all, and am wondering why I got a 15min wait queue time, I went into the game mode "legend of the poro king" while I did select a champion, must I press "lock in" otherwise it'd kick me out? That and i'd also like to ask why was there no warning and why did they remove the 5min queue time. (I think there was one)

replies.body:
It's in draft format, so I believe you do have to lock in your champion. 

Typically featured game modes do have the standard 6 minute dodge timer, poro king however, has the 15 minute timer associated with ARAM (I guess because they are both howling abyss)
